proposal: Diving into the world of AGAM, it's clear you're not just wearing hats, you're setting trends on the blockchain! With 198 holders on the ETH network, you're crafting a unique blend of style and tech. Imagine enhancing this vision with your own DEX or engaging the community further with a lottery they can call their own. Let's weave our tools into your fabric and create something that stands out in the blockchain fashion show.
